description: This file defines the layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including request handling, server-side data loading, and rendering of header, footer, and slot components.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests, setting cache control headers to optimize caching and performance.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads current server time as a reactive data source for the component's rendering.
